sentences.en: A green Yule and a white Pasch make a fat churchyard.
Churchyard gully freely, on any account rises and fall, upper broken up.
sentences.cn: 境内沟壑纵横, 高低起伏, 地表支离破碎.

sentences.en: He is buried in the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 他被葬于教堂的墓地里.

sentences.en: His mortal remains are buried in the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 他的遗体埋葬在教堂的墓地里.

sentences.en: His parents were now reposing in the local churchyard.
sentences.cn: 他的双亲现在长眠于本地教堂墓地.

sentences.en: In all the churchyard only one grave is always fresh and well cared for.
sentences.cn: 在整个墓地,只有这座坟照料得好,总是生机盎然.

sentences.en: Revenue inspects company of free tax zone churchyard enterprise.
sentences.cn: 税务局把保税区企业视作境内企业.

sentences.en: She knew that the nettles grew in the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 她知道荨麻生长在教堂墓园里.

sentences.en: She was laid to rest in the churchyard.
The graves of the seven lie in the nearby churchyard.
sentences.cn: 这七位烈士的坟墓就在附近的教堂墓地.

sentences.en: The parson, heading the procession, had just turned right towards the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 走在行进队伍最前面的教区牧师刚刚向右转弯，朝着教堂墓地走去。

sentences.en: The small churchyard was surrounded by a rusted wrought-iron fence.
sentences.cn: 不大的教堂墓地周边围着一圈生锈的熟铁栅栏。

sentences.en: They laid the dead shepherd to sleep in the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 他们把死去的羊倌葬在教堂墓地.

sentences.en: This bleak place overgrown with nettles was the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 那蔓草丛生的凄凉地方是教堂公墓.

words.tran_cn: 经常上教堂的；经常去做礼拜的
像教堂的；适合于作牧师的
教会的；适于教会的；教堂的

trans.tran_en: a piece of land around a church where people are buried
